Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2012 10:14PM - edited Feb 22, 2012 10:17PM by Lucky48 Call your PS ASAP. There is no reason to wait. If you have an infection due to the implant, it needs to be treated, if it's something else THAT needs to be treated. Promise you will call right away?
